content: **crocheted top in drops safran piece is crocheted top down with round yoke and lace pattern size xs xxl ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern e-311 yarn group a ------------------------------------------------------- **size** xs - s - m - l - xl - xxl **materials** drops safran from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 200-250-250-300-300-350 g colour 59 red clay **crochet gauge** 20 treble crochets in width and 11 5 row vertically = 10 x 10 cm crochet hook drops crochet hook size 4 mm hook size is only a suggestion if you have too many stitches on 10 cm switch to larger hook if you have too few stitches on 10 cm switch to smaller hook
